flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
因其惊人的变身能力，
无论与谁都能成为伙伴。
但是百变怪同类间关系恶劣。

驚きの　変身能力で
どんな者とも　仲間に　なれる。
メタモン同士は　仲が　悪い。

With its astonishing capacity for
metamorphosis, it can get along with anything.
It does not get along well with its fellow Ditto.

Grazie alle sue incredibili doti metamorfiche,
può assumere le sembianze di qualunque essere
vivente. I Ditto non vanno d’accordo fra di loro.

Ditto puede hacerse amigo de otros Pokémon
gracias a su habilidad para transformarse. Sin
embargo, los Ditto no se llevan bien entre sí.

Dank seiner Fähigkeiten als Gestaltwandler
kann es sich mit allen Lebewesen anfreunden.
Nur mit Artgenossen kommt es nicht zurecht.

Grâce à son don de transformation, ce Pokémon
peut devenir l’ami de tous les êtres vivants, sauf
des autres Métamorph, qu’il déteste.

因其驚人的變身能力，
無論與誰都能成為夥伴。
但是百變怪同類之間的關係惡劣。

놀라운 변신 능력으로
누구와도 동료가 될 수 있다.
메타몽끼리는 사이가 나쁘다.

おどろきの　へんしんのうりょくで
どんなものとも　なかまに　なれる。
メタモンどうしは　なかが　わるい。

体の　細胞を　組 替えて　変身する。
思い出しながら　以前　見た　ものに　変わると
ちょっと　違う　形に　なってしまうのだ。

Ditto rearranges its cell structure to transform itself into other
shapes. However, if it tries to transform itself into something
by relying on its memory, this Pokémon manages to get
details wrong.

Ditto cambia la sua struttura cellulare per assumere molte
altre forme. Tuttavia, quando si affida solo alla sua memoria,
talvolta dimentica dettagli importanti.

Ditto reorganiza la estructura de sus células para adoptar
otras formas. Pero, como intente transformarse en algo
guiándose por los datos que tenga almacenados en la
memoria, habrá detalles que se le escapen.

Ditto verändert seine Zellstruktur, um sich in eine andere Form
zu verwandeln. Wenn es sich dabei jedoch auf sein Gedächtnis
verlässt, unterlaufen diesem Pokémon schon mal Fehler.

Métamorph peut modifier sa structure moléculaire pour
prendre d’autres formes. Lorsqu’il essaie de se transformer
de mémoire, il lui arrive de se tromper sur certains détails.

몸의 세포를 재구성하여 변신한다.
전에 봤던 것을 기억해내면서 바뀌면
조금 다른 형태가 되어버린다.

からだの　さいぼうを　く かえて　へんしんする。
おもいだしながら　いぜん　 た　ものに　かわると
ちょっと　ちがう　かたちに　なってしまうのだ。

体の　細胞を　組 替えて　変身する。
思い出しながら　以前　見た　ものに　変わると
ちょっと　違う　形に　なってしまうのだ。

Ditto rearranges its cell structure to transform itself into other
shapes. However, if it tries to transform itself into something
by relying on its memory, this Pokémon manages to get
details wrong.

Ditto cambia la sua struttura cellulare per assumere molte
altre forme. Tuttavia, quando si affida solo alla sua memoria,
talvolta dimentica dettagli importanti.

Ditto reorganiza la estructura de sus células para adoptar
otras formas. Pero, como intente transformarse en algo
guiándose por los datos que tenga almacenados en la
memoria, habrá detalles que se le escapen.

Ditto verändert seine Zellstruktur, um sich in eine andere Form
zu verwandeln. Wenn es sich dabei jedoch auf sein Gedächtnis
verlässt, unterlaufen diesem Pokémon schon mal Fehler.

Métamorph peut modifier sa structure moléculaire pour
prendre d’autres formes. Lorsqu’il essaie de se transformer
de mémoire, il lui arrive de se tromper sur certains détails.

몸의 세포를 재구성하여 변신한다.
전에 봤던 것을 기억해내면서 바뀌면
조금 다른 형태가 되어버린다.

からだの　さいぼうを　く かえて　へんしんする。
おもいだしながら　いぜん　 た　ものに　かわると
ちょっと　ちがう　かたちに　なってしまうのだ。

体の　細胞の　作りを
自分で　組み替えて
ほかの　生命体に　変身する。

It can freely recombine its own cellular structure to
transform into other life-forms.

Può ricombinare a piacere la propria struttura
cellulare per trasformarsi in altri esseri viventi.

Tiene la capacidad de reorganizar su estructura celular
para convertirse en otras formas de vida.

Es kann seine eigene Zellstruktur frei zusammensetzen
und sich in jede andere Lebensform verwandeln.

Métamorph peut modifier sa structure cellulaire à
sa guise pour se transformer en n’importe quelle
forme vivante.

몸의 세포 구성을
스스로 바꿔서 다른
생명체로 변신한다.

からだの　さいぼうの　つくりを
じぶんで　くみかえて　ほかの
せいめいたいに　へんしんする。

全身の　細胞を　組み替えて
見たものの　形　そっくりに
変身する　能力を　持つ。

It has the ability to reconstitute its entire cellular
structure to transform into whatever it sees.

Ha la capacità di modificare la sua struttura cellulare
per trasformarsi in qualsiasi cosa veda.

Puede alterar por completo su estructura celular para
emular cualquier objeto que vea.

Es kann seine Zellstruktur so verändern, dass es
sich in alles verwandeln kann, was es sieht.

Il a la capacité de modifier sa structure cellulaire pour
prendre l’apparence de ce qu’il voit.

전신의 세포를 재구성해서
본 것의 모양과 똑 닮게
변신하는 능력을 가지고 있다.

ぜんしんの　さいぼうを　くみかえて
みたものの　かたち　そっくりに
へんしんする　のうりょくを　もつ。

It can reconstitute its entire cellular
structure to change into what it sees,
but it returns to normal when it relaxes.

It can reconstitute its entire cellular
structure to change into what it sees,
but it returns to normal when it relaxes.

It has the ability to reconstitute
its entire cellular structure to
transform into whatever it sees.

Il a la capacité de modifier sa
structure cellulaire pour prendre
l’apparence de ce qu’il voit.

It has the ability to reconstitute
its entire cellular structure to
transform into whatever it sees.

Il a la capacité de modifier sa
structure cellulaire pour prendre
l’apparence de ce qu’il voit.

Its transformation ability is perfect.
However, if made to laugh, it
can’t maintain its disguise.

It can transform into anything.
When it sleeps, it changes into a
stone to avoid being attacked.

It has the ability to reconstitute
its entire cellular structure to
transform into whatever it sees.

It has the ability to reconstitute
its entire cellular structure to
transform into whatever it sees.

It has the ability to reconstitute
its entire cellular structure to
transform into whatever it sees.

Capable of copying an opponent’s genetic
code to instantly transform itself into a
duplicate of the enemy.

It can freely recombine its own cellular
structure to transform into other life-
forms.

A DITTO rearranges its cell structure to
transform itself. However, if it tries to
change based on its memory, it will get
details wrong.

DITTO rearranges its cell structure to
transform itself into other shapes.
However, if it tries to transform itself into something by relying on its memory,
this POKéMON manages to get details
wrong.

DITTO rearranges its cell structure to
transform itself into other shapes.
However, if it tries to transform itself into something by relying on its memory,
this POKéMON manages to get details
wrong.

When it encount­
ers another DITTO,
it will move faster than normal
to duplicate that
opponent exactly.

Its transformation
ability is per­
fect. However, if made to laugh, it
can't maintain its
disguise.

It can transform
into anything.
When it sleeps, it changes into a
stone to avoid
being attacked.

When it spots an
enemy, its body
transfigures into an almost perfect
copy of its oppo­
nent.

Capable of copying
an enemy's genetic
code to instantly transform itself
into a duplicate
of the enemy.

Capable of copying
an enemy's genetic
code to instantly transform itself
into a duplicate
of the enemy.
